    • Method Detail

      • addGeoFence

        public static void addGeoFence(java.lang.String geoFenceId,
               double latitude,
               double longitude,
               int radius)
        Add new geofence.
        Parameters:
        geoFenceId - - A meaningful unique id for the geofence.
        latitude - - The geo latitude of the geofence.
        longitude - - The geo longitude of the geofence.
        radius - - The maximal distance from the geofence lon,lat that will trigger an entrance or exit of the geofence

      • addGeoFence

        public static void addGeoFence(java.lang.String geoFenceId,
               double latitude,
               double longitude,
               int radius,
               long expiration)
        Add new geofence.
        Parameters:
        geoFenceId - - A meaningful unique id for the geofence.
        latitude - - The geo latitude of the geofence.
        longitude - - The geo longitude of the geofence.
        radius - - The maximal distance from the geofence lon,lat that will trigger an entrance or exit of the geofence
        expiration - - The life time of the geofence in Milliseconds.

      • addGeoFence

        public static void addGeoFence(java.lang.String geoFenceId,
               double latitude,
               double longitude,
               int radius,
               long expiration,
               long loiteringDelayMs)
        Add new geofence.
        Parameters:
        geoFenceId - - A meaningful unique id for the geofence.
        latitude - - The geo latitude of the geofence.
        longitude - - The geo longitude of the geofence.
        radius - - The maximal distance from the geofence lon,lat that will trigger an entrance or exit of the geofence
        expiration - - The life time of the geofence in Milliseconds.
        loiteringDelayMs - - The time in Milliseconds to send @see Geofence.GEOFENCE_TRANSITION_DWELL after user entered the geofence, allows you to get event after the user is inside the geofence for a while.

      • removeGeoFence

        public static void removeGeoFence(java.lang.String geofenceId)
        Remove existing geofence
        Parameters:
        geofenceId - - A meaningful unique id for the geofence.
